General.Name: Zhejiang Sunflower Light Energy
General.Description: Zhejiang Sunflower Great Health Limited Liability Company engages in the research, development, production, and sale of solar energy batteries and components worldwide. It offers polycrystalline silicon wafers; and photovoltaic cells and modules. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Sunflower Light Energy Science & Technology Limited Liability Company and changed its name to Zhejiang Sunflower Great Health Limited Liability Company in March 2020. Zhejiang Sunflower Great Health Limited Liability Company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.

3.Name: Mr. Wei Biao Pan
3.Title: Chief Financial Officer and Deputy Gen. Mang.
